opendial.arch

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.arch.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    System-wide settings for OpenDial.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-02-04 09:51:48 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      • Settings

        public Settings()

      • Settings

        public Settings(java.util.Properties mapping)
        Creates a new settings with the values provided as argument. Values that are not explicitly specified in the mapping are set to their default values.
        Parameters:
        mapping - the properties

    • Method Detail

      • fillSettings

        public void fillSettings(java.util.Properties mapping)
        Fills the current settings with the values provided as argument. Existing values are overridden.
        Parameters:
        mapping - the properties

      • getFullMapping

        public java.util.Properties getFullMapping()
        Returns a representation of the settings in terms of a mapping between property labels and values
        Returns:
        the corresponding mapping

      • generateXML

        public org.w3c.dom.Element generateXML(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                throws DialException
        Generates an XML element that encodes the settings
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to which the element must comply
        Returns:
        the resulting XML element
        Throws:
        DialException - if the XML generation failed
